name: Carvest
description:
The god of metal has sent you, his angel, to get back the metal humans harvest from the ground…any way you can. 

The goal of the game is to cause as much mayhem as possible in traffic, as every collision will earn you some metal towards your goal.

CONTROLS

* Place piece - Left click or ENTER

* Rotate piece - Middle mouse click or R

* Unselect piece -  Right click or BACKSPACE

* Menu -  Escape

POWERS

* Arrow - Speed boost in a certain direction

* Spikes - Slows  cars down if placed perpendicularly to the road

* Portal - Teleports the car to a differently colored portal

* Wall -  It's a brick wall. That's it.

A level editor is also available.

**Warning:  Some levels might be unreasonably difficult...Very little time to playtest, unfortunately. If you're really struggling, there's a glitch that involves walls.. Good luck!**

Font used: http://sciops.net/downloads/vga/

Tools: Godot, Photoshop, FL Studio
